Package edu.monash.fit2099.game.items

Class Bottle

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
edu.monash.fit2099.game.items.Bottle
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable, Obtainable
public class Bottle
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
implements Obtainable
A global Singleton class representing a Bottle object the player can obtain in the game.
See Also:
edu.monash.fit2099.game.items

  • Method Details

    • addWater

      public void addWater​(Water water)
      Method to aid in the manipulation of the waterStack attribute. Responsible for adding water to the Stack.
      Parameters:
      water - Water object to be added

    • removeWater

      public ConsumableItem removeWater()
      Method to aid in the manipulation of the waterStack attribute. Responsible for removing Water objects from the Stack and assigning them to a variable to be returned.
      Returns:
      a variable 'water', which is an instance of ConsumableItem.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Method that returns True or False depending on whether the waterStack attribute is empty or not.
      Returns:
      True if empty, False if not.

    • getItems

      public java.lang.String getItems()
      Method that converts all elements of the Stack into String to display on menu or wherever else needed.
      Returns:
      a String listing all Water objects present in the Stack.
